name: Centipede VR - Down to Earth - Epic Mega Jam
name_original: Centipede VR - Down to Earth - Epic Mega Jam
description:
Game developed in 4 nights  for the Epic Mega Jam 2019.

The theme of the jam is "Down to Earth".

The game prototype/idea are inspired/tribute to "Pixels the movie", scene on battle with Centipede.

In this Jam I try to develop a VR game for HTC Vive, but it's playable without vr (only Windows version).

Tools / Assets used for this project:

- FX Variety Pack (Epic Store)
- Good Sky  (Epic Store)
- ModularBuildingSet  (Epic Store)
- Some assets from Soul City (extern walls)
- Scify Weapon Light  (Epic Store)

- Some effects from Gamemaster Audio -  ProSound MiniPack 
- Ambient music -> Waka Flocka Flame – Game On (feat. Good Charlotte) [from Pixels – The Movie]

Team members: 
Atronos - Voxel designer (Centipe & Mushroom) ->  https://vanther.itch.io/
Toni CG - Development -> https://tonicg.itch..io/
